English Sentences: Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God's elect, and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuus Kiristtoosi kiittido taani PHauloosi, Xoossaa aillee, ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais. Xoossai doorido asau ammanoi de7anaadaaninne Xoossaa tumatettaa eraakko eta kaalettanaadan taani doorettada kiitettaas.

English Sentences: In hope of eternal life, which God, that cannot lie, promised before the world began;
Wolaitta Sentences: Worddotenna Xoossai nuuyyo ha merinaa de7uwaa daro wodiyaappe kase immana giis.

English Sentences: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching, which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nuna ashshiyaagee likke wodiyan ba qaalan hagaa qonccissiis; i hadarettidi tana azazidoogaadan, taani a qaalaa yootais.

English Sentences: To Titus, mine own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammanuwaa issippetettan ta tumu na7aa neeyyo Tiituyyo, Xoossaa Aawaappenne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosappe, aaro kehatettai, maarotettainne sarotettai gido.

English Sentences: For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena Qarxxeesen aggada yiidoogee, neeni attidabaa giigissanaassanne, taani azazidoogaadan, katama ubban woosa keetta cimata dooranaassa.

English Sentences: If any be blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cimai borettennaagaanne issi machchee xalaalai de7iyoogaanne ammaniya naati de7iyoogaa gidanau bessees; a naati miishsha mooriyoobaaninne woi azazettennan ixxiyooban asi amassalennaageeta gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not selfwilled, not soon angry, not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, he cimai Xoossaa oosuwaa azaziya alaafe gidiiddi, borettennaagaa, otorettennaagaanne elle hanqqettennaagaa gidanau bessees; qassi mattottennaagaa, sugennaagaanne yorattennaagaa gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: But a lover of hospitality, a lover of good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin imattaa mokkiyaagaanne lo77obaa dosiyaagaa gidanau bessees; qassi akeekanchcha, xillo, geeshshanne bana naagiyaagaa gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught, that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammanettiya de7oi beettiyo timirttiyaara giigiya qaalaa i mintti oiqqo. Yaatikko harata tumu ammanuwaa tamaarissiyoogan minttettanaunne qassi hegaa ixxiyaageetakka zoranau danddayana.

English Sentences: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, azazettennaageeti, pattennabaa haasayiyaageeti, harata cimmiyaageetinne qaxxarettidaageetu bagga gidiya daro asati de7oosona.

English Sentences: Whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tamaarissanau bessenna pokkiya ogiyan miishsha demmanau tamaarissiyoogan keetta ubbaa mooriyo gishshau, eta haasayaa teqqana bessees.

English Sentences: One of themselves, even a prophet of their own, said, The Cretians are alway liars, evil beasts, slow bellies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta giddoppe issoi, hananabaa yootiya etaagee, "Qarxxeese asai ubba wode, worddanchcha, iita do7anne yoranchcha qassi azalla asa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: This witness is true. Wherefore rebuke them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith;
Wolaitta Sentences: I markkattidoogee tuma; hegaa gishshau, neeni etassi mino ammanoi de7anaadaaninne qassi Aihudatu haisiyaanne tumaa ixxida asatu azazuwaa eti siyennaadan,

English Sentences: Not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men, that turn from the truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta minttada seeranau bessees.

English Sentences: Unto the pure all things are pure: but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure; but even their mind and conscience is defiled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta huuphen geeshsha gididaageetussi ubbabaikka geeshsha; shin tunatussinne ammanennaageetussi eta wozanaa qofainne eta zoriya wozanai tunido gishshau, etau aibinne geeshsha gidenna.

English Sentences: They profess that they know God; but in works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banttau eti Xoossaa eriyoogaa qoncciyan yootoosona; shin eti sheneyiyaageeta, azazettennaageetanne lo77o ooso ubbaukka giigennaageeta gidiyo gishshau, bantta oosuwan a erokko goosona.

English Sentences: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni de7uwaa demmanau giigiya timirttiyaa tamaarissanau bessees.

English Sentences: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cima attumaasai ammanuwan, siiquwaaninne danddayan mino gidanaadan, qassi mattottennaagaa, woppu giidaagaanne banakka naagiyaagaa gidanaadan zora.

English Sentences: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka cima maccaasai geeshsha de7o de7iya maccaasatudan haniyaagaa, zigirennaagaa, woine eessassi haarettennaagaanne lo77obaa tamaarissiyaagaa gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa qaalai borettenna mala, bantta keettaawatanne bantta naata siiqiyaageeta,

English Sentences: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.
Wolaitta Sentences: banttanakka naagiyaageeta, geeshshata, bantta keettan oottiyaageeta, kehatanne bantta keettaawatussikka azazettiyaageeta gidana mala, yelaga maccaasaa tamaarissona.

English Sentences: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka yelaga attumaasati banttana naagana mala zora.

English Sentences: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne huuphenkka lo77o ooso ubban etau leemiso gida; neeni tamaarissiyoogankka ammanettiyaagaanne kiphata gida.

English Sentences: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne morkketi nuna zigiriyoobai etassi xayiyo wode eti yeellatana mala, neeni borettenna lo77o haasayaa haasaya.

English Sentences: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ailleti bantta godatussi azazettana malanne, etaara palamettennan ubbaban eta ufaissana mala zora.

English Sentences: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta godatuppe wuuqqenna mala, qassi nuna ashshiyaa Xoossaabaa tamaarissiyoogaa ubbaban galatissanau, bantta oottiyo oosuwan ubba wode lo77onne ammanettiyaageeta gidiyoogaa bessana mala, eta zora.

English Sentences: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai asa ubbaa ashshiya ba aaro kehatettaa qonccissiis.

English Sentences: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;
Wolaitta Sentences: He aaro kehatettai nagara oosuwaanne ha sa7aa amuwaa nuuni agganaadaaninne nu huuphiyaa naagidi, ha sa7an Xoossaa milatidi, xillotettan de7anaadan, nuna tamaarissees.

English Sentences: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nu gita Xoossai, nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosi beettana giido anjjettida bonchcho gallassaa naagoos.

English Sentences: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita ooso ubbaappe i nuna wozanaunne lo77obaa oottanau amottiya ba geeshsha asa kessanau, nu gishshau, ba huuphiyaa immiis.

English Sentences: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni hagaa tamaarissa, ne kumetta maatan zoranne seera; ooninne nena karoppo.

English Sentences: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti deriyaa haariyaageetussinne godatettai de7iyoogeetussi haarettanau, azazettanaunne lo77o ooso ubbaa oottanau giigettanaadan eta hassayissa;

English Sentences: To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, but gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi eti oonanne cayenna mala, palamettenna mala, asa ubbaa ashkketettaanne doshotettaa bessiyaageeta gidanaadan zora.

English Sentences: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, nuuni kase nu huuphenkka eeyyata, azazettennaageeta, baliyaageetanne amossinne dumma dumma ufaissaassi ailledan haarettiyaageeta; qassi iitatettaaninne qanaatiyan de7iyaageeta; asan ixettiyaageetanne issoi issuwaakka ixxiyaageeta.

English Sentences: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuna ashshiya Xoossaa kehatettainne asa i siiqiyoogeenne beettido wode,

English Sentences: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;
Wolaitta Sentences: i ba maarotettaadankka, ooratta yeletaassi haniya meechchaaninne Geeshsha Ayyaanan ooraxxiyoogan nuna ashshidoogaappe attin, nuuni xillo oosuwaa oottidoogaana gidenna.

English Sentences: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba aaro kehatettan nuuni xillanaadaaninne, i immana giido merinaa de7uwaa laattanaadan,

English Sentences: That being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.
Wolaitta Sentences: nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nu bolli darissidi tigiis.

English Sentences: This is a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha haasayai ammanettidaagaa; Xoossaa ammaniyaageeti lo77o oosuwaa oottanau giiganaadan, ha yohuwaa etassi neeni minttada yootanau koyais; hageeti asau lo77onne go77iyaageeta.

English Sentences: But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eeyyatetta palamaappe, zare qoodiyoogaappe, walassaappenne higgeban ooyettiyoogaappe naagetta. Aissi giikko, hegeeti go77ennaageetanne allaalle kessennaageeta.

English Sentences: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaahotetta medhdhiya urai geella asa gidiyoogaanne ba huuphiyan pirddidi nagaraa oottiyoogaa erada,

English Sentences: Knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: issitoo naa77utoo a seeridoogaappe guyyiyan, hegaa milatiya asappe shaahetta.

English Sentences: When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Arxxemaasa woi Tikiqoosa neekko kiittiyo wode, neeni taakko Niqophiliyoona yaanau minna. Aissi giikko, taani balgguwaa yaani shaaccanau qofaa qachchaas.

English Sentences: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa eriya Zemaasinne Aphiloosi ogiyaa biyo wode, etassi aibinne paccenna mala, eta loitta maadda.

English Sentences: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu asaikka pattenna asa gididi attenna mala, bana keehi koshshiyaabaa demmanau, lo77o oosuwaa minnidi oottiyoogaa tamaaro.

English Sentences: All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace be with you all. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanaara de7iya ubbati nena saro saro giidosona. Nuna ammanuwan siiqiyaageeta saro saro ga. Xoossaa aaro kehatettai inttenaara ubbaara issippe gido. Amin77i.
